intrigue: you meet a man who seems suspicious about you. Indeed, he approaches and pushes you unceremoniously towards a table on which are placed three mysterious cups. This one offers you to play a game: you must draw a cup randomly, and receive the reward, whatever it is. Whereas you were observing the objects on the table, he slips behind you and doesn't seem to want to let you go. To get out of this situation, you must play his game. Which cup are you taking ?

goblets.desc: The metal one, looking very old, engraved with a dragon's head
goblets.name: metal

goblets.desc: The biggest of the three, made of a material you can't identify
goblets.name: biggest

goblets.desc: The last one, carved in blue wood, and so sparkling that it seems enchanted
goblets.name: sparkling

life: You gently lift the {goblet} goblet and notice the nothing underneath. Disappointed, and a sore loser, you get the two other goblets flying around. Noticing that there was nothing in the other cups either, you clam revenge on this scammer but this one gives you a big punch before fleeing. You lose **{amount}ğŸ’”**.
time: You gently lift the {goblet} goblet and notice a coin underneath. Unfortunately, the man, taking advantage of your thinking, grabs the coin and runs away. You hurl after him, but unfortunately do not manage to catch up that guy; and you lose **{amount}ğŸ•‘** because of this detour.
nothing: You slowly lift the {goblet} goblet and notice the nothing underneath. Disappointed, you leave sadly. Who knows, you might have better luck next time.
end: Facing your lack of reaction, the man tries to rob you. Noticing that he is cleverly trying to empty your pockets, you savagely threaten him. Fearing for his life, he gives you a punch that knocks you down, before fleeing. You lose **{amount}ğŸ’”**.
